Name: Tom Farrand
What makes you want to do Good for Nothi: Help solve issues and make a positive social impact but in quirky, fun way. Find new ways of working that encourage real innovation. Connect like-minded and diverse folk to do stuff i.e. not just thinking and talking, but participating and making. It's an interesting experiment that people can get stuck into and develop together.
What special skills do you bring?: Linking what's possible (technology) with what's needed (to make things better). A half-decent network of amazing folk from all sorts of backgrounds. Helping teams work together to get stuff done. Making unusual connections. Interested in open data and the stories it can tell when you start playing with it.

Name: dan burgess
What makes you want to do Good for Nothi: i like the experimental nature, the creative possibilities, the urgency, the diversity of the people, the vibe.
What special skills do you bring?: energy, open-ness, ideas, mc-ing, filming, editing, music, creativity in sustainability, connectedness, geekery, tea making.

Name: Anouk Van Den Eijnde
What makes you want to do Good for Nothi: Get to know some inspiring charities & social enterprises and the individuals behind them and help them innovate
What special skills do you bring?: Filming, editing, strategy, event organising, improvising

Name: TomR
What makes you want to do Good for Nothi: The world can always do with more positive action.
